team_id.desc: ID for the workspace where the invite request was made.

invite_request_id.desc: ID of the request to invite.

errors.already_processed: The `invite_request_id` passed has already been approved or denied.
errors.failed_to_send_invite: The actual invite (separate from approval) failed to process. This may happen because the user is disabled, already in the team, etc.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Invite Request Admin APIs are not enabled for this team.
errors.missing_scope: This token doesn't have the scope required.
errors.not_an_admin: This token doesn't have admin privileges.
